metadata.name: Schtasks From Suspicious Folders
metadata.comment: Detects scheduled task creations that have suspicious action command and folder combinations

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\schtasks.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('schtasks.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /create ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pwsh')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /r '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\programdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%programdata%'))))

output.summary: Detects scheduled task creations that have suspicious action command and folder combinations
